attributes.review: I’m sorry, the quality of the app is just as corrupt as the quality of our president. Do not download.

attributes.review: such a bad app. first off, it’s named after a cheeto who has run the USA into the ground. oh and he’s racist. and homophobic. and xenophobic. second off .... nope that’s all. trump for jail 2020 !!!!!!

attributes.review: this app doesn’t even work and it always glitches i can’t i downloaded it and it’s just poorly set up nothing even works such a bad app and the format is horrible and hard to find where things are.

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever installed. I thought it was a game too throw trump in the garbage but it’s not. Would not recommend too anyone.
attributes.title: App

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE, IT TOOK AO LONG TO DOWNLOAD, I do not understand why this app was put in the App Store if the people who made it can’t even PERFECT IT.
